title: URGENT RIOT!!
body:
To anyone who works for riot games I have been banned permanently for use of 3rd party software. I have never used any software or would never want to sabotage or destroy someone else's league of legends experience. I have put all my life savings into my account and i have never been banned after playing for 2 years. Any rioter who has a big heart can you please un ban me as i have tried to contact riot support and nobody is helping me i have been the best player i can be with no ban. If you want to ban me for the sake of it at least suspend my account for 2 weeks. I love this game i have put so much work into it and I need anyone who can help me out i have not used any such software this ban is not fair for someone who has never received one. I am urging anyone from riot to please help me I am trying to contact riot support please look at my ticket for further details.

Kind regards.

replies.body:
From what I can see, you allowed someone else to play on your account, either a friend or an elo booster, and this person has used cheats that resulted in your account being banned.

This is one reason why we warn against account sharing so seriously.

I have made a reply on my ticket please get someone to look at it it has been 6 days and i am starting to get depressed. Please get someone who is willing to help me as I have been the most sincere, honest and compassionate as i can be.

Kind regards.
I know riot is known for their generosity and kindness with utmost respect I am asking out of sincerity I have not even received one chance and I haven't done anything wrong.
